20110128162012.000|20110128162015.000|TR0|Internet.

20110128162036.000|20110128162039.000|TR0|difficulties of that having happened today.

20110128162043.000|20110128162046.000|TR0|difficulty getting their reports out.  
20110128162046.000|20110128162048.000|TR0|It's also people who were blogging, who 
20110128162048.000|20110128162051.000|TR0|were tweeting, who were putting things on 
20110128162051.000|20110128162053.000|TR0|Facebook the past few days, the past 
20110128162053.000|20110128162055.000|TR0|couple of weeks.       As we all know, 
20110128162055.000|20110128162058.000|TR0|this movement has really been fueled by 
20110128162058.000|20110128162100.000|TR0|online activism and by people using social 
20110128162100.000|20110128162103.000|TR0|media to get the message across, to get 
20110128162103.000|20110128162105.000|TR0|the demonstrators out into the street.  
20110128162105.000|20110128162107.000|TR0|Today, virtually quiet.
20110128162107.000|20110128162110.000|TR0|

20110128162112.000|20110128162115.000|TR0|so active and inviting people to

20110128162119.000|20110128162122.000|TR0|people that have been actively tweeting in 
20110128162122.000|20110128162124.000|TR0|the last few days, the last couple of 
20110128162124.000|20110128162127.000|TR0|weeks, completely gone quiet.
20110128162127.000|20110128162129.000|TR0|
20110128162129.000|20110128162131.000|TR0|So people are still trying to get the 
20110128162131.000|20110128162134.000|TR0|message out, they're trying to find 
20110128162134.000|20110128162136.000|TR0|alternative means to do that.  There are 
20110128162136.000|20110128162139.000|TR0|ways that they are encouraging users 
20110128162139.000|20110128162141.000|TR0|within Egypt and in the region to do so.  
20110128162141.000|20110128162143.000|TR0|But really, what we've seen today, a 
20110128162143.000|20110128162146.000|TR0|complete clampdown on the Internet in 
20110128162146.000|20110128162148.000|TR0|Egypt -- Jim
20110128162148.000|20110128162151.000|TR0|
20110128162151.000|20110128162153.000|TR0|CLANCY:  And Mohammed, there may only 
20110128162153.000|20110128162155.000|TR0|about -- we don't know how many 
20110128162155.000|20110128162158.000|TR0|demonstrators have been out in the streets 
20110128162158.000|20110128162200.000|TR0|today.  We can certainly put the number in 
20110128162200.000|20110128162203.000|TR0|the tens of thousands.  But in a country 
20110128162203.000|20110128162205.000|TR0|of 80 million, to think that one-tenth of 
20110128162205.000|20110128162207.000|TR0|one percent have been out in the streets,

20110128165335.000|20110128165338.000|TR0|declarations saying there would be zero 
20110128165338.000|20110128165340.000|TR0|tolerance for demonstrations and that's

20110128165359.000|20110128165402.000|TR0|
20110128165402.000|20110128165404.000|TR0|Now I'm seeing two soldiers walking up the 
20110128165404.000|20110128165406.000|TR0|street in the direction of the protesters
